name: Uptime
description: Uptime is a utility command that provides information about how long the system has been running without a reboot. It displays the current time, the system uptime, the number of users currently logged on, and the system load averages for the past 1, 5, and 15 minutes. This tool is useful for system administrators to monitor the system's operational status and load. It is typically used in troubleshooting and system monitoring scenarios.
